name: include
description: Include certain buttons. Button's order will be as you type it. default: ['facebook', 'twitter', 'linkedin', 'pinterest', 'google', 'stumble', 'reddit', 'whatsapp', 'tumblr', 'telegram']

name: exclude
description: Exclude certain buttons. if defined, these buttons will be excluded, default: [ ]

name: title
description: Override title meta tag, default: null

name: description
description: Override description meta tag, default: null

name: image
description: Override image meta tag, default: null

name: tags
description: Set the tags for Tumblr and Twitter, default: null

name: twitterAccount
description: Add via @accountName at the end of the tweets, default: null
